text: Does anyone know how to create a test and validation data set in R?

attachments.title: How to split data into training/testing sets using sample function in R program
attachments.text: I've just started using R and I'm not sure how to incorporate my dataset with the following sample code: sample(x, size, replace = FALSE, prob = NULL) I have a dataset that I need to put into a
attachments.fallback: How to split data into training/testing sets using sample function in R program

text: I used something from Dr. Race’s notes

set.seed(7515)
perm=sample(1:45212)
df_randomOrder=df[perm,]
train = df_randomOrder[1:floor(0.75*45212),]
test = df_randomOrder[(floor(0.75*45212)+1):45212,]
This code is from her Decision Tree Analysis in R. Thank you <@U1M1L5G6L> for pointing me in the right direction.
